Docs.summary: Provides access to the security settings for endpoints configured with the named pipe binding.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the security mode for the named pipe binding.
Docs.value: The value of the for the named pipe binding. The default value is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Valid values for this property are:
- Transport - Use transport-based security. The default setting uses NTLM which does not provide server authentication.
- None - Use no security.
## Examples The following code shows how to set the Mode property:
[!code-cs[S_UENetNamedPipeSecurity#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/p-system.servicemodel.ne_3_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeTransport() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport%2A> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized. This is used by WCF for XAML integration.
Docs.returns: if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurity.Transport%2A> property value should be serialized; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the transport security for the named pipe binding.
Docs.value: The value of the for the named pipe binding.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method gives access to the <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel> for the named pipe transport through <xref:System.ServiceModel.NamedPipeTransportSecurity.ProtectionLevel%2A>.
